definition: Dahu or Tahu township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
Great Lakes/the five north American Great Lakes
Dahu or Tahu township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan

sentences.english: Sheyang Lake was a famous large lake in North Jiangsu in historical period.
sentences.chinese: 射陽湖是蘇北歷史上著名的大湖。

sentences.english: These people set up a lab called the Great Lakes Environ-mental Research laboratory .
sentences.chinese: 這些人建立了一個五大湖環境調查研究實驗室。

sentences.english: And ships can reach the Atlantic Ocean from the Great Lakes through the Saint Lawrence Seaway.
sentences.chinese: 而船隻則能夠從五大湖經過聖勞倫斯航道到達大西洋。

sentences.english: So the canal joined the Great Lakes with the Atlantic Ocean.
sentences.chinese: 所以，伊利運河就把五大湖與大西洋連接起來了。

sentences.english: East lake water is clear for swimming.
sentences.chinese: 東湖大湖裏的水很清澈比較適合游泳。

sentences.english: The republic abuts on the lake.
Chicago sits next to Lake Michigan, one of North America's Great Lakes.
sentences.chinese: 芝加哥坐落在北美五大湖之一密歇根湖畔。

sentences.english: The great lakes along The Yangtze are also victims of the drought.
sentences.chinese: 長江流域五大湖也遭受旱災的影響。

sentences.english: Native Americans who lived near the Great Lakes often fished by torchlight.
sentences.chinese: 居住在“五大湖”附近的土著人經常使用火把捕魚。

sentences.english: The Pike lives mainly in large rivers and lakes.
sentences.chinese: 狗魚主要生活在大江大湖中。

sentences.english: In the Great Lakes , I hope I can sleep a lot and forget all problem.
sentences.chinese: 在五大湖，我希望我能睡得飽並忘記所有的問題。

sentences.english: East of the mountain is a large lake.
sentences.chinese: 這座山的東面有一個大湖。

sentences.english: But now the fish are moving north toward the Great Lakes.
sentences.chinese: 但是，現在這些魚開始向北朝着五大湖移動。

sentences.english: Sea lampreys leave a swath of destruction as the invasive species chomps through the Great Lakes.
sentences.chinese: 七鰓鰻留下一條致命的傷口，其在五大湖大行其道。

sentences.english: Wen also exchanged opinions with KABILA on the situation of the Great Lake Region.
sentences.chinese: 溫家寶還就大湖地區形勢與卡比拉交換了意見。

definition: Hunei township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
Neihu district of Taipei City 臺北市|台北市[Tai2 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
"heavenly lake", lake situated on a mountain/used as the name of numerous lakes, such as 長白山天池|长白山天池[Chang2 bai2 shan1 Tian1 chi2]
